meanings.definition: Resembling a tube in shape or structure.
meanings.sent1: The tubulous plant stems were long and cylindrical.
meanings.sent2: The lab equipment had a tubulous design for efficient flow.
meanings.sent3: The tubulous straws at the party made drinking a fun challenge.
meanings.sent4: The tubulous tunnels of the ant farm were a miniature marvel.
meanings.sent5: The tubulous clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton candy tubes.

meanings.sent1: The tubulous structure of the building housed many pipes.
meanings.sent2: The tubulous network of veins carried nutrients throughout the leaf.
meanings.sent3: The tubulous pasta was perfect for holding the sauce inside.
meanings.sent4: The tubulous traffic jams in the city were a nightmare to navigate.
meanings.sent5: The tubulous roller coaster was a thrilling ride through twists and turns.

meanings.definition: Having the form of a tube.
meanings.sent1: The tubulous flower petals were delicate and slender.
meanings.sent2: The tubulous balloon slowly floated up into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The tubulous straw hat provided shade on a sunny day.
meanings.sent4: The tubulous telescope allowed for clear views of the stars.
meanings.sent5: The tubulous slide at the playground was a favorite among children.
